text: The Box is a 1967 American animated short film directed by Fred Wolf. ==Summary== It retells the story of Noah's Ark set in a bar with an old man carrying a box.MUBI ==Accolades== The film won the Academy Award for Best Animated Short Film at the 40th Academy Awards.Short Film Oscars® in 1968-Oscars on YouTube ==Preservation== The Box was preserved by the Academy Film Archive in 2003. ==References== ==See also== *1967 in film *Limited animation ==External links== * *The Box on YouTube *The Box on Internet Archive Category:1967 films Category:1967 animated films Category:1960s animated short films Category:American animated short films Category:American films Category:Noah's Ark in popular culture Category:Noah's Ark in film Category:Best Animated Short Academy Award winners Category:English-language films
